post.description: OAuth2 compatible token login, get an access token for future requests.

Login using CLI token and get a JWT access token.
This endpoint allows mmpp CLI library to authenticate using CLI tokens.

get.description:
Get current user information with resource limits
(works with both JWT and CLI tokens).

schema.title: Response Get Current User Info Api V1 Auth Me Get

post.description: Create new user.

get.description: Retrieve all users. Admin only.

schema.title: Response Read Users Api V1 Users  Get

get.description:
Get current user with optional usage information.

Args:
    include_usage: If True, includes current resource usage statistics
Get current user's resource usage and limits.

schema.title: Response Get User Usage Api V1 Users Me Usage Get

get.description: Return list of currently active users based on websocket connections.

schema.title: Response Get Active Users Api V1 Users Active Get

post.description: Create new user by admin.

schema.title: Response Delete User Api V1 Users  User Id  Delete

Response Delete Avatar Api V1 Users Me Avatar Delete

put.description:
Update user's preferred language.
Supported languages: pl, en

get.description: Check if the SLURM cluster is reachable and running.

schema.title: Response Check Cluster Status Api V1 Jobs Status Get

get.description:
Retrieve jobs for current user with current SLURM status from monitoring service.
Also handles cases where SLURM has active jobs that don't exist in database.

schema.title: Response Get Jobs Api V1 Jobs  Get

post.description:
Create new job by submitting a template-based job to SLURM.
If preview=True, returns the filled template without submitting the job.

schema.title: Response Create Job Api V1 Jobs  Post

get.description: Retrieve all jobs from all users. Admin only.

schema.title: Response Get All Jobs Admin Api V1 Jobs Admin All Get

get.description:
Get real-time status of user's active jobs from SLURM.
This endpoint provides time_left and other real-time SLURM data.

schema.title: Response Get Active Jobs Api V1 Jobs Active Jobs Get

get.description: Get list of available job templates.

schema.title: Response Get Templates Api V1 Jobs Templates Get

get.description: Get job by ID.

delete.description: Delete a job and cancel it in SLURM if it's still running

get.description:
Get status of a specific job from cached monitoring data.
No direct SLURM calls - uses monitoring service cache.

schema.title: Response Get Job Status Api V1 Jobs  Job Id  Status Get

get.description: Get the node where a job is running.

schema.title: Response Get Job Node Api V1 Jobs  Job Id  Node Get

schema.title: Response Get Job Log Api V1 Jobs  Job Id  Log Get

get.description: Get error log content for a job.

delete.description: Close an SSH tunnel for a job

get.description:
Sprawdź status tunelu SSH dla zadania.
Weryfikuje czy tunel jest aktywny i dostępny zarówno wewnątrz jak i na zewnątrz kontenera.

schema.title: Response Check Tunnel Status Api V1 Jobs  Job Id  Tunnel Status Get

get.description: Get all users for admin panel (superuser only).
Perform health check on a specific SSH tunnel
Perform health check on all active tunnels (admin only)

post.description: Perform health check on a specific SSH tunnel for a job

get.description:
Get real-time status of user's active jobs from both containers and task_queue.
This endpoint provides unified view of all active jobs (containers + amumax tasks).

schema.title: Response Get Active All Jobs Api V1 Jobs Active All Get

get.description: Get all tasks in the queue for the current user, optionally filtered by status.

schema.title: Response Get Tasks Api V1 Tasks  Get

post.description: Create a new task in the simulation queue.

get.description: Get the current status of the task queue for the current user.

post.description:
Upload MX3 file with optional automatic task creation.

If auto_start=false (default): Only uploads file, returns file info
If auto_start=true: Uploads file AND creates TaskQueueJob automatically

This provides flexibility for different client workflows.

schema.title: Response Upload Mx3 With Optional Task Api V1 Tasks Upload Mx3 Post

post.description:
Validate a simulation file before creating a task.

This endpoint works for all file types (.mx3, .py, etc.)
Returns detailed validation info including file content for preview.

schema.title: Response Validate File Api V1 Tasks Validate Post

get.description:
Get full content of a simulation file for preview.

This endpoint returns the complete file content with syntax highlighting.

schema.title: Response Get File Content Api V1 Tasks File Content Get

get.description: Get details of a specific task.

delete.description: Delete a task from the queue.

get.description: Get results for a completed task.

with MD5 verification.
